He got an angry glare.

TT: He turned Predicon.  And I won't let your kind live for what he 
has done.

He fires the plasma rifle 8 times in the general direction of Panthos 
(general direction to compensat for where he thinks he'll probably 
dodge to,l but close enough to pose a serious risk if he stands 
still).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> TT:  Let's just say it's not ALWAYS best to keep your mouth shut.  
> And the onlyway to atone is to kill my own brother.  My on oil and 
> steel.  Let's just leave it at that o.k..
> 
> {Panthos}
> 
>     Panthos raised a feline eye brow. "Well well well for a moment I 
figured you were a maximal with a chip on his shoulder. Guess that 
statement  prove sit otherwise. Can't see any of them going after 
thier own kin like we preds would. Then again a pred like myself 
wouldn't be looking for atonement about anything..."
> 
>     The panther sort of grinned letting his fangs show quite fully. 
"So where's this brother of yours to? I take it cybertron rather than 
this dirt ball but one can never tell these days..."
